Reference

Package information

tbcleanr

tbcleanr: tools for cleaning TB data

Aggregating functions

Combine multiple functions to streamline workflow

adm_data_cleanr()

Clean TB admission data sets

lab_data_cleanr()

Cleans laboratory data sets

Admission data functions

Functions used only for admission data sets

adm_classr()

Add object class to identify admission database

adm_subset()

Subset adm variables

cavities_fixer()

Convert admission x-ray variables to factorised output

drug_fixer()

Convert drug doses to binary output

gender_fixer()

Factorise gender variable

hiv_fixer()

Factorise HIV variable

id_detangle()

Split admission ID number

outcome_fixer()

Fix TB treatment outcomes

txhistory()

Clean treatment history variable

recorded_dst()

Clean recorded baseline DST variable

Mycobacteriology lab data functions

Functions used only for mycobacteriology lab data sets

dst_consolidator()

Consolidate DST results

lab_classr()

Add object class to identify lab database

lab_date_fixer()

Aggregate dates in lab database

lab_import_checkr()

Confirm correct lab data import

lab_sample_fixer()

Lab sample fixer

lab_subset()

Subset lab variables

mtbdrplus_fixer()

Consolidate Hain MTBDRplus results

result_consolidator()

Consolidate smear and culture results

xpert_result_fixer()

Consolidate Xpert results

Drug change data functions

Functions used only for drug treatment change data sets

change_cleanr()

Clean drug change data

Adherance and BMI data functions

Functions used only for adherance and BMI data sets

adhere_cleanr()

Clean drug adherence data

response_weight_cleanr()

Treatment response weight cleanr

OCA Standard Indicators functions

Functions designed for cleaning annual OCA SI data

clean_standard_indicators()

Clean Annual Standard TB Indicators

General purpose functions

Functions that can be used on multiple data sets

binary_fixer()

Convert admission binary variables to factorised output

date_format()

Detect and convert date variables

yn_binary_fixer()

Factorise binary (Y/N) variables

Utilities

General package functions (not exported) in misc_utils.R

xpert_variable_detector()

Xpert variable detector
